formattedAddress: 135 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Sustainable recycled clothes simply feel better on your body than the other environmentally unfriendly pieces you'll pick up in Soho... The best part is that given the quality, my friends thought I was lying when I told them it was recycled. I was really happy with the overall pricing considering that these clothes are very well made AND completely sustainable. I've been to this location twice and the customer service was exceptional... Super helpful when it came to recommending items or grabbing me a different color upon request when I was the changing room. They have something for everybody, surfer or not, highly recommend

authorAttribution.displayName: Hairstyling for Men with Avenue Man

originalText.text: I reluctantly walked into the shop when my friend dragged me in there because I really don't get the hype about sustainable clothing... After leaving their store I was shocked to have realized how soft yet well made a sustainable / eco T-shirt could be. Prices weren't bad either given the quality. Didn't buy anything but I'll probably come back the next time I'm around. The sales associate knew a lot about the brand and almost got me to buy a pair of jeans, wish I had sales people like that working in my store haha

originalText.text: Their clothes are versatile and you can pair them with anything and still look good, which I love because that's an unspoken aspect of sustainable clothing. The issue with most sustainable brands is that the pieces are hard to pair with everything else in your wardrobe... Not Outerknown.

originalText.text: This location is very poorly managed. Was visiting NYC and stopped by twice, both times closed but were supposed to be open.

text.text: This location is very poorly managed. Was visiting NYC and stopped by twice, both times closed but were supposed to be open.

originalText.text: Was excited to finally have a physical location here in NYC. Especially one so close to where I live. Started off the new year with a visit only to be met with disappointment. Employee who assisted me ‘Diego’ seemed annoyed and bored to be assisting me. Will continue to shop online but think I have had my last store visit. :/
